">     <subfield code="a">The 7-valent pneumococcal conjugate vaccine has been introduced in national immunisation programmes of most industrialised countries and recently in two African GAVI eligible countries (Rwanda and The Gambia). However the long term effects of PCV are still unclear, as beneficial direct and herd immunity effects might be countered by serotype replacement.</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="653" ind1="1" ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">Human</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="653" ind1="1" ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">Infection</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="653" ind1="1" ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">Inflammation</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="653" ind1="1" ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">Streptococcus</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="100" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">Melegaro, Alessia</subfield>     <subfield code="u">DONDENA Centre for Research on Social Dynamics, Bocconi University</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="037" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">OpenAIRE-POLYMOD-2010-001</subfield>   </datafield>   <datafield tag="041" ind1=" " ind2=" ">     <subfield code="a">eng</subfield>   </datafield> </record> </collection>
